availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Logan Porter (Barren County, Kentucky printer and court clerk)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, printer and court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Martha E. Porter. Printer in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1860. Circuit court clerk in Barren County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1 , p. 754.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Glasgow, p. 542B.
"Lawyers' Dean Dies," Democrat and Chronicle (Rochester, NY), August 18, 1937, p. 1.
"William Logan Porter (1842-1937)," Find A Grave, Memorial #76568099, accessed April 25, 2020, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/76568099.
KYR-0001-004-0373.
